entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the teacher in charge of the class. She is described as having a little laugh and smiling widely.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is one of the students in the class. She is mentioned as being addressed by Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student in the class. He is mentioned as raising his hand to speak.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student in the class. He is mentioned as raising his hand to speak.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge addresses Miss Granger by name.
Ron Weasley speaks to Professor Umbridge, but she turns her back on him.
Professor Umbridge's pouchy eyes linger on Harry for a moment.
